comment_text: Can Costco confirm if a new location will open in Leominster, Massachusetts?

Charlie- Unfortunately, we don't have any information to provide on a location in that area. However, you can count on us to share your interest with our Real Estate team for review. In the meantime, please visit the following link to stay up to date on locations coming soon: https://www.costco.com/new-locations.html Thanks for reaching out! -Bekah

While refueling, I backed into an open pump—something I’ve done many times before. An attendant approached me aggressively, accused me of driving “too fast,” and demanded I leave. Though I apologized and assured him I’d be more cautious, he disabled the pump and refused to engage constructively. Being publicly reprimanded in front of other customers was frustrating and humiliating.

Brendan- We're sorry to learn of the negative experience you've had. We'd like to learn more. Please email us at Costcocare@costco.com with a copy of this post, your 12-digit membership number, best contact information, and the pertinent details. -Max
Why did you end the FOB? It was so much easier than having to get out a card at the pump? Please reconsider reinstating the FOB use. Thank you

Louise- We understand that the FOB was a very convenient tool for scanning at the pump and we appreciate you sharing your feedback about its return. In the meantime, please know that the Digital Membership Card is an option for scanning at the pump and we hope it saves you time like the FOB did. Thank you for reaching out to us. -Bekah
I’ll look into that. Thank you for responding to my comment
We need a Costco in Oroville CA. Love this place but it's like 30 minutes to get to a Costco. Thanks

My hearing aids are from Miracle Ear and rest on a charger, not needing any batteries. That part is good. They never told me about any time warranty on it when I did this and I had my appointment one day after the six months was up.
